analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PibbleMain.mintContributors (/unique_contracts/0xe56c8fbc5d4b522239ab7c3f314a08b612b3ee5f.sol#591-612):
	External calls:
	- MintableToken(token).mint(contributor,tokenCount) (/unique_contracts/0xe56c8fbc5d4b522239ab7c3f314a08b612b3ee5f.sol#605-608)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorList (/unique_contracts/0xe56c8fbc5d4b522239ab7c3f314a08b612b3ee5f.sol#609-612)

PibbleMain.mintContributors (/unique_contracts/0xe56c8fbc5d4b522239ab7c3f314a08b612b3ee5f.sol#591-612) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).mint(contributor,tokenCount) (/unique_contracts/0xe56c8fbc5d4b522239ab7c3f314a08b612b3ee5f.sol#605-608)

PibbleMain.mintContributors has external calls inside a loop:
	- MintableToken(token).mint(contributor,tokenCount) (/unique_contracts/0xe56c8fbc5d4b522239ab7c3f314a08b612b3ee5f.sol#605-608)
